product_name: Blind Barber90 Proof Strong Hold Matte Pomade
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeSustainable PackagingGive BackBlind Barber 90 Proof Pomade leaves your hair with a strong hold and a matte finish.
details: DetailsBenefitsStrong HoldMatte FinishTonka Bean (light vanilla) FragranceWater Soluble - Rinses out with easeEnhanced with Hops (yes from beer) to add protein and fight dandruffParaben and Sulfate-FreeKey IngredientsTonka Bean as a scent, resembles a sweet/spicy fragrance that is reminiscent of vanilla and almondHops Extract tones the scalp and provides vitality, it regulates dandruff and slows hair lossSweet Almond Oil is rich in Vitamin E, as well as omega 3 and 6 fatty acids, which is some of the vital ingredients to hair health. These make the hair shiny, strong and also nourish and open up hair follicles, encouraging healthy hair growth.Soybean Oil - The high amounts of Vitamin E in Soybeans also make it a powerful antioxidant that's able to preserve hair colorItem 2570516How To UseWhen applying hair pomade or wax, start at the back of the head and work your way toward the front, making sure you coat those roots. This method helps spreads the product evenly, avoiding clumps of product at the front portion of your hair. Stylist Tip: For optimal results, emulsify a dime-sized dollop in your hands and work through towel-dried hair.Precautions: Avoid direct contact with eyes and do not ingest. Keep out of reach of children.IngredientsWater/Aqua/Eau, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Ceteareth-20, Cetearyl Alcohol, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax/Copernicia Cerifera Cera/Cire de carnauba, Ozokerite, PVP, VP/VA Copolymer, Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Benzyl Alcohol, Fragrance/Parfum, Chlorphenesin, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Panthenol, Cystine Bis-PG-Propyl Silanetriol, Glycerin, Hydrolyzed Vegetable Protein PG-Propyl Silanetriol, Humulus Lupulus (Hops) Flower Extract, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Protein, Keratin, Hydrolyzed Keratin, Citric Acid, Disodium EDTA, Ethylhexylglycerin, Linalool, Hexyl Cinnamal, Cinnamyl Alcohol, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Coumarin, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Citronellol, Limonene
how_to_use: When applying hair pomade or wax, start at the back of the head and work your way toward the front, making sure you coat those roots. This method helps spreads the product evenly, avoiding clumps of product at the front portion of your hair. Stylist Tip: For optimal results, emulsify a dime-sized dollop in your hands and work through towel-dried hair.Precautions: Avoid direct contact with eyes and do not ingest. Keep out of reach of children.
ingredients: Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax/Copernicia Cerifera Cera/Cire de carnauba

reviews.headline: Best smelling hair pomade!
reviews.comments:
I bought this for my husband who has very wavy hair. It has excellent hold, but this SCENT!  

The scent is very woodsy with sandalwood. I kinda wish that they would make it into a cologne for men. 

The hold is very strong. It's easy to overdo with this product. But as long as you mind how much you're using, I think this is a great product to keep unruly hair in place.

reviews.headline: Husbands favorite
reviews.comments: I got this for my husband and he's purchased it twice since. It's one of the only pomades he's tried that doesn't leave his scalp itchy.

reviews.headline: Best Stuff Ever
reviews.comments: I am female with a pixie haircut and this works so well. It had a light pleasant scent that is not too manly and holds like a dream. Is matte finish and looks natural.

reviews.headline: Not that great
reviews.comments: Disappointed with this product. I would say it is medium hold, and it leaves flakes like crazy. If you didn't have dandruff, well, now you do. Buy something else

reviews.headline: Strong hold but flakes
reviews.comments: Strong hold that lasts but it left flakes in my hair

reviews.headline: Holds strong
reviews.comments: Holds strong bought for someone who works construction and it lasted all day

reviews.headline: My favorite so far.
reviews.comments: I've gone through multiple pomades and this is the best I've used so far. The feel and ease of application is nice as well as the natural look once it dries. Took a couple times to use the right amount. If you use to much it's like your hair is wet all day and if you use to little it only holds for a couple hours at most.

reviews.headline: Hated it
reviews.comments: For a product called 90 proof strong hold it has a weak hold it's sticky and stiff but does not hold I used a little I used a lot but still didn't get the results I wanted For the price I would recommend not wasting your money

reviews.headline: I would not buy this product again.
Wet Glue
reviews.comments: This product is definitely not for straightened hair that was kinky curly it was as if I was put in white glue all over my hair my hair started to revert and it was wet this is not what I wanted maybe I need edge control even got to be glue gel worked better

reviews.headline: Husband loves it
reviews.comments: My partner usually doesn't try new products when it comes to his hair... he just buys what his barber uses on him. I absolutely hated afar he used to use, so he tried this one and we haven't looked back. It gives good hold, doesn't have an overwhelming scent, and is easily to manipulate. Every time I go to ulta he asks me to grab one for him.

reviews.headline: Solid!
reviews.comments: I decided to try this pomade because I recently got a pixie cut. I like that it adds volume and hold to my fine, straight hair. I'll usually run a dime-size amount through the roots and use a round brush and blow dryer to style. It doesn't leave my hair crunchy or too greasy, and it's easy to fix my hair throughout the day if I need to. I'm not usually a fan of fragrance, but the vanilla is very elegant and unisex. I also like that it washes out pretty easily. I would repurchase it.

reviews.headline: Perfect product
reviews.comments: I have short hair, but finding product that does not make my hair  look greasy  is a challenge.  This is perfect.

reviews.headline: Not quite
reviews.comments: Was looking for a replacement for Cibu Rice (discontibued) or AC Fiber (has parabens). The hold is more like a medium and doesn't have as much texture as American Crew Fiber. Scent is a little too strong and sweet for me. Not quite my ideal but not bad.

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: Amazing pomade! Applied to dry hair, this gives a beautiful healthy matte finish to the hair. It applies like butter, so easily! And then the hold starts to kick in,.. And that's some SERIOUS hold! A little goes a long way! It gives great texture, volume. The Tonka bean vanilla scent is amazing!! I also like to apply a tiny pea sized amount into damp hair, to blow-dry it in and it'll give a nice voluminous, bouncy texture with a healthy matte finish.. Then I'll add another pea sized amount and the style will last all day. Really nice!

faceoff_positive.comments: Amazing pomade! Applied to dry hair, this gives a beautiful healthy matte finish to the hair. It applies like butter, so easily! And then the hold starts to kick in,.. And that's some SERIOUS hold! A little goes a long way! It gives great texture, volume. The Tonka bean vanilla scent is amazing!! I also like to apply a tiny pea sized amount into damp hair, to blow-dry it in and it'll give a nice voluminous, bouncy texture with a healthy matte finish.. Then I'll add another pea sized amount and the style will last all day. Really nice!
faceoff_positive.headline: Amazing

faceoff_negative.comments: I'm really disappointed in the product. I had received a smaller container of the 90 proof. This sample size really had me excited because I finally found a product that made my hair look amazing - it had a great micro web look and really went on great! It dried really mat as well which is great for me! I couldnt wait to get a larger size! Unfortunately when I received my purchase the product was not even remotely the same. The gel leaves hair greasy and does not have the same micro web feel not does it have the same grip on my hair. Every time I go to do my hair now I really don't look forward to it - I pretty much have resorted to wearing hats. Honestly, if someone could help me out in finding something that fits what I found in the sample size above I would be so happy! Please help.
faceoff_negative.headline: I'm really disappointed in the
